short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Pixels Extension is a tool made for every pixels enthusiast. Essential and easy to use for every Web3 Gamer. Currently in beta.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NEW - Voxels V4.9.4
üêæ Pet & Taskboard Update
+ Hover over your pet to view its inventory (enable storage hover in settings first)
+ Large taskboard rework: Toggle between minimal and detailed view (Shift + D) to view a tasks reward, cost and total amount, as well as the skill XP reward!
+ Live task speed for last 5 and 60 minutes
+ Skill XP summary on stats page
+ Player name history
+ Many QoL updates! Settings now remain on reload for minimised Voxels and inventory prices 

Voxels V4.9.3
üìù Taskboard Update 2.0
+ More precise listing of minimum levels for Pixel Tasks
+ User Skill Level check for minimum levels
+ Taskboard rework (view all tasks in 1 view)
+ Bug fixes: Storage Hover closes when opening a storage, Fixed coin display toggle

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Introducing the ultimate tool to elevate your Pixels gaming experience and propel your progress to new heights ‚Äì the Voxels extension! Say goodbye to waiting for your farm timers to run down and unlock maximum efficiency and boost your Pixels gains.

After installation, be sure to pin the extension in the top right corner for quick and easy access. Follow the instructions displayed on play.pixels.xyz to integrate Voxels into your daily farming routine.

Shortcuts:

- Press 'v' to open and close Voxels.
- Press 't' to calculate total value of items in inventory
- Press 'Shift' + '1/2/3/4/5' to switch between Voxels pages
- Press 'Shift' + 'G' to open Guild Page
- Press 'Shift' + 'P' to open Voxels Passes Page
- Press 'Shift' + 'A' to open Leaderboards
- Press 'Shift' + 'S' to open settings
- Press 'Shift' + 'F' to toggle full page
- Press 'Shift' + 'D' to toggle detailed task view
- Press 'r' to disable prices in inventory
- Press 'n' to toggle notifications

Make sure to leave a review with ideas, or if you like the extension :)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

V4.0
Farm timer red,  Save your storages, Task board feature, Large scale design overhaul, Bug fixes

V4.1 - Total cost in tasks tab, Timer for tasks tab, Inventory prices style change, Bug fixes

V4.2 - Number of items in inventory displayed in task page, Total value of items with 't', NuCyber Integration, Bug fixes

V4.3
+ Timers: "Free Collectibles", Trees and tree stumps, Cow, Custom timers
+ Inventory: Added total inventory value, Added toggle by pressing "R"
+ Stats: Personal stats (current world, pixels in USD, total skill level), In depth stats and graphs on pixels made and coins spent, Leaderboard
+ Design: New Logo, New navigation hub, New main page
+ QoL: Mobile responsive version, Press "Shift"+"1/2/3/4/5"
+ Other: Storages increased to 40 (premium), Bug fixes, UI changes + A lot more!

Voxels V4.4
üõ°Ô∏è The Voxels Guild update
+ Biggest guild assistant with guild leaderboards, guild member statistics (sort by levels, shards, pixels made per day) and special guild leader analytics
‚è±Ô∏è Timers
+ Added all industries and crops
+ Search locations by name
+ Added filter for farms and industries
+ Added notifications for timers (enable chrome/browser notifications in your system settings)
üì¶ Storages - Search storages by name or by items
+ QoL changes and Bug fixes

Voxels V4.5
+ Bug fixes (Storage)
+ Voxels shards

Voxels V4.6
üèÜ Player leaderboards (rank players by overall level or individual skills)
+ Player pages with all stats: levels, coins, pixels, reputation, guilds, skills with rank and historical tracker
+ Press 'Shift' + 'A' to open Leaderboards
+ Bug fixes

Voxels V4.7 + V4.8
+ Bug fixes: Fixed task timers, Fixed user sign up

Voxels V4.9
üìù The Taskboard Update - A huge update to the whole stats section
+ List of Tasks done per 24h
+ Pixels made for each task category (Basic, VIP, Landowner)
+ Minimum Levels required for Pixel tasks (on Leaderboard page)
+ In depth stats for leaderboard (view other players coins spent, coins/pixels ratio, tasks done etc.)
+ QoL: Real time tracking of inventory items for task page. Increased task tracking accuracy to 100%. Click on your username on your stats page to open your profile page.

Voxels V4.9.1
üì¶ The Storage Update - View your items and storage values
+ Hover over any storage to see items inside, as well as their prices (activate in settings)
+ View total value of your storages on the hover display
+ Stack prices of storage items now displayed

Voxels V4.9.2
+ Bug Fix: Fixed overlay issue on mobile not allowing to close inventory
+ Coins Tasks per 24h exchanged for items delivered per 24h
